texts.name: Nivea
texts.biography: Nivea was the daughter of the long perished prince named Rurik. Because people believed that woman shouldn't rule the principalty, Oleg became the prince. But, despite being a threat to his rule, Oleg brought Nivea closer to the court. Being a member of aristocracy, Nivea somehow had the best jewelry in the principalty, rivaling the prince's ones.

specialty.description: Increases kingdom's income by 1 crystal per day
specialty.name: +1 Crystal
